meanings.definition: To surpass in rooting out or eradicating
meanings.sent1: The gardener outroots all the weeds from the flower bed.
meanings.sent2: She outroots the invasive plants to protect the native species.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's power is to outroots all evil from the city.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outroots any obstacles in her path to success.
meanings.sent5: The detective's keen eye outroots the truth from the lies.

meanings.definition: To have roots that extend beyond or outside of something
meanings.sent1: The tree outroots into the neighboring yard, causing disputes.
meanings.sent2: The ivy plant outroots and spreads quickly along the fence.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous vine outroots into unknown territories.
meanings.sent4: Her influence outroots into various aspects of society.
meanings.sent5: The idea outroots and grows into a revolutionary movement.
